Posts.Content:
Hello everyone,
I have been quietly following along in this forum since I found out I may have a problem - some lumps found on physial exam and I'm waiting on my mammogram/ultrasound appointment in 2 weeks. I don't mean to highjack this thread but I was just wondering what "reconstruction" means when talking about
 mastectomy - is this placement of an implant at the same time as the other procedure? Sorry if this is a stupid question, I'm still new to all this. Thanks!
Posts.Title: Sister just diagnosed

Posts.Content:
Thanks for the answer to my question, and Les I hope your sister has a speedy and uneventful recovery !!!!
Meadow
